goal.en: Students will understand the concept of continuous and discrete signal. They will also know the difference between analog and digital systems.
goal.ch: 增進學員對連續、離散時間訊號的瞭解，明白類比、數位系統間的差異

content.en:
1. Introduction
2. Time-Domain Representation of Linear Time-Invariant Systems
3. Fourier Representations of Signals and Linear Time-Invariant Systems
4. Applications of Fourier Representations to Mixed Signal Classes
5. Application to Communication Systems
6. Representing Signals by Using Continuous-Time Complex Exponentials: the Laplace Transform
7. Representing Signals by Using Discrete-Time Complex Exponentials: the z-Transform
8. Application to Filters and Equalizers
9. Application to Linear Feedback Systems
10. Spectral Analysis
11. Introduction to Image Systems
12. Introduction to Filter Design
13. Hands-On DSP Experiments
